April 23, 2020 5:37 AM

Capcom bans CeroBlast, Low Tier God from all events

Capcom ban statement

Capcom has been made aware of a situation where Dalauan “LowTierGod” Sparrow and Christina “CeroBlast” Tran have made offensive statements online,” Capcom said. “This is a clear violation of Capcom’s player code of conduct, so we have concluded that we have no choice but to ban LowTierGod and CeroBlast from all Capcom-owned and/or operated events, including Capcom Pro Tour and Street Fighter League until further notice.”

  • Tweet by Capcom
  • Article by dotesports
May 1, 2020

Dale Wilson doxes Trevor Belmont .

Trevor Belmont!

On November 28, 2020, Dale Wilson doxxed Trevor Belmont during a live stream, revealing his personal information, including his address and residence.

  • Tweet by Trevor Belmont
May 1, 2021 11:55 PM

Puppies are great too

Puppy!

Doggo ipsum sub woofer smol wow very biscit aqua doggo pupper dat tungg tho big ol pupper, very jealous pupper mlem heckin angery woofer very jealous pupper. Blep waggy wags long doggo, corgo. Tungg wow such tempt mlem very jealous pupper boofers lotsa pats, snoot smol big ol ruff doge super chub, long doggo heckin good boys and girls h*ck heck. Shoober blop many pats borkf, such treat. Big ol what a nice floof long water shoob wrinkler heck sub woofer, pupper porgo wow very biscit.
